products.title: Splash Cream Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Cream Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £7.96 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder great for injecting colour into any room. Our Splash Cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Our Roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2089 Fabric Colour: Cream Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Oyster Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Oyster Roller Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £8.83 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The Splash Oyster roller blind is a very light, natural cream colour. This neutral tone will work well in most spaces and look beautiful when matched with woods throughout the home. Our roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as our made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee providing additional peace of mind.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX1893 Fabric Colour: Oyster Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Dove
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Dove Standard Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 3048mm
 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Joins: Blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
